sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MERCHANT_NO ,TERMINAL_NO ,TMK ,CHANNEL_TYPE ,TMK_LOCAL ,PIN_KEY ,MAC_KEY ,TRACK_KEY ,LOT_NO ,CREATE_DATE ,CREATE_TIME ,NETWORK_NO ,EXT ,EXT1 FROM terminal_management WHERE 1=1 AND terminal_management.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MERCHANT_NO) Like '%'||(#merchant_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_NO) Like '%'||(#terminal_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TMK) Like '%'||(#tmk:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANNEL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#channel_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TMK_LOCAL) Like '%'||(#tmk_local:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#pin_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAC_KEY) Like '%'||(#mac_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACK_KEY) Like '%'||(#track_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOT_NO) Like '%'||(#lot_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(NETWORK_NO) Like '%'||(#network_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT1) Like '%'||(#ext1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM terminal_management WHERE 1=1 AND terminal_management.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MERCHANT_NO) Like '%'||(#merchant_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_NO) Like '%'||(#terminal_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TMK) Like '%'||(#tmk:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANNEL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#channel_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TMK_LOCAL) Like '%'||(#tmk_local:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#pin_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAC_KEY) Like '%'||(#mac_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACK_KEY) Like '%'||(#track_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOT_NO) Like '%'||(#lot_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(NETWORK_NO) Like '%'||(#network_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT1) Like '%'||(#ext1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
